mapper.select: SELECT c.name AS name, d.full_name AS department_name, COUNT(uc.user_id) AS number, c.state AS state, c.is_deleted AS is_deleted, CASE WHEN uc.role = 1 THEN u.name ELSE NULL END AS manager FROM tbl_club c LEFT JOIN tbl_user_club uc ON c.id = uc.club_id LEFT JOIN tbl_user u ON uc.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN tbl_department d ON c.department_id = d.id GROUP BY c.id
